name: Connect O' Sphere
description:
Post Your Highest Score in the Comment Section!!

Connect O' Sphere

Developed By - Katie Hill

Developed for the Extra Credit Game Jam #4. Link Below:

https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-jam-4

Developed with Unreal Engine 4.22.0

The players goal is to survive as long as they can while trying to better their chances of survival by connecting with incoming spheres while avoiding non comparable cubes. 

This was my first game jam and I started half way through so the game is unfinished as most game jam games are and their is no audio in the game.

How to Play

Survive as long as you can!

You are the green sphere,

Cubes will harm you,

Spheres will make you grow.

Android

Use the onscreen joystick to move your sphere.

Windows

Use the arrow keys or ‘w’, ‘a’, ‘s’, ‘d’ to move your sphere.

Post Your Highest Score in the Comment Section!!
